title: Haven't played in awhile, do we no longer receive mastery tokens in ARAM?
body: Recently played an ARAM and got an an S- on Brand and never received a token. I am Mastery 5 with him and already have one mastery 6 token. but in this game I didn't get any. Is this new??

replies.body: Grading is available in ARAM, but tokens have so far been exclusive to Summoner's Rift.  More info on this is available on our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, but as long as you get the required grade in Summoner's Rift you should be good!  I hope that helps clears things up, and good luck!
